titleStmt.title: The doctrine and vse of repentance necessarie to be practised and vsed of all who looke to sing the song of Moses, and the song of the lambe beyond the glassie sea: Reuel.15.23. Preached in sundrie sermons in the parish church of Alhallowes Bredstreete in London: by Rich. Stock
Doctrine and use of repentance.
titleStmt.author: Stock, Richard, 1569?-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Edmund Weauer and William Welby,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
